name: aw-how-sweet-cold-stone-creamery-ice-cream-social-freebies
title: Aw, How Sweet: Cold Stone Creamery Ice Cream Social [Freebies]
author: Morgan Levy
contentEncoded:
Cold Stone Creamery’s “World’s Largest Ice Cream Social” tonight is sweet in more ways than just one. For the entire month of September, Cold Stone has been supporting the Make-a-Wish Foundation, and they’re capping it off with an nationwide party that comes complete with free ice cream. From 5pm-8pm tonight, anyone can drop by Cold Stone (locations) and snag some free “Jack’s Creation” or “Emily’s Creation,” new signature creations inspired by two children in the Make-a-Wish program. The new flavors actually sound pretty disgusting to us – Nutter Butter and Marshmallow – But the whole thing is just so… sweet. 

Photo by yanec.
